item.description:
This meet up will simultaneously serve to introduce local Scrabble players to each other as well as allow us to get a few games in. Bring your boards or just bring yourself!

Recent Meetups have lasted about 2 hours, with some folks staying for two games, and some folks leaving after just one. Turnout has ranged from 6-12. Skill and experience has ranged too, from novice players to tournament players. One thing has stayed the same, and that's everyone's fun!

A good resource for new players is the Cross Tables "cheat sheet"--a list of two letter and other highly playable words. Look it over if you like, but you don't need to to have fun playing.
item.how_to_find_us: Au Bon Pain is pretty empty on Sundays--you will have no trouble spotting the Scrabble boards. Some folks may wander in late so don't leave if it looks empty at first.
item.name: Scrabble Enthusiasts of Boston November Meetup
